Package backend

Interface Api

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApiImpl
    public interface Api
    Provides an interface for all Backend operations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void createNewLobby​(java.lang.String connectionId, java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String lobbyName)
      Call to create a new lobby.
      void getLobbies​(java.lang.String connectionId)
      Call to request a list of all open lobbies.
      void joinLobby​(java.lang.String lobbyId, java.lang.String connectionId, java.lang.String userId)
      Call to join an existing lobby.
      void leaveLobby​(java.lang.String connectionId)
      Call to leave if currently in a lobby.
      void registerPlayer​(java.lang.String connectionId, java.lang.String name)
      Call to register a new player with the given name.
      void setPlayerReady​(java.lang.String connectionId, boolean isReady)
      Call to set whether or not a player is ready.
      void startRace​(java.lang.String connectionId)
      Call to start a race with all ready players.
      void updateProgress​(java.lang.String connectionId, ProgressSnapshot snapshot)
      Call to update a players race progress.

      • registerPlayer

        void registerPlayer​(java.lang.String connectionId,
                    java.lang.String name)
        Call to register a new player with the given name.
        Parameters:
        connectionId - id of the server connection
        name - id of the user

        lobbyName - name of the lobby

        Parameters:
        lobbyId - id of lobby to join
        connectionId - id of server connection
        userId - id of user

      • updateProgress

        Call to update a players race progress.
